document.bingtitle: Popeyes Chicken & Biscuits menu - San Jose, CA 95132 - (408) 923-2645
document.webtitle: Popeyes ChickenBiscuits menu - San Jose, CA 95132 - (408) 923-2645
document.description: It was pretty good, but you still got to expect ... attentive and fast, and she remembers what my order ... This Cajun-style fast food restaurant first opened in New Orleans ...
document.body:
Popeyes Chicken&Biscuits 1671 N Capitol Ave , San Jose CA 95132 popeyes.com (408) 923-2645 Cuisines and Dishes at Popeyes Chicken&Biscuits: Wings American
